content: (Madbaha mumpaake manavaatti manavaalante valathuvashaththaay nilkkunnu. Thozhmakkaaran manavaalante idathuvashaththum, thozhmakkari manavaattiyude valathuvashaththum nilkkanam)
Pattakkaaran : Thante sthuthikalal aakaashavum bhoomiyum niranjirikkunna balavaanaaya daivam thamburaan parishudhdhan parishudhdhan parishudhdhan uyarangaleil sthuthi.
Janam : Daivamaaya karththaavinte thirunaamaththil / vannavanum varuvaanirikkunnavanumaayaavan vaazhthappettavanaakunnu / uyarangaleil sthuthi.
Janam : Balavaane nee parishudhanakunnu. / Maranamilaththavane nee parishudhanakunnu. / njangalkk Venda kurishikkappettavane / njangaloodu karuna cheyyename. (Moonnu praavashyam)
Pattakkaaran : Njangalude karththaave / njangalodu karuna cheyyename.
Janam : Njangalude karththaave / kripayundayi njangalodu karunacheyyename. / Njangalude karththaave / njangalude namaskkaaravum shushrooshayum kaikkondu / njangalodu karuna cheyyename.
Janam : Srashttaave ninakku sthuthi. / Paapikalaaya ninte adiyaarodu / karuna cheyyunna Mashihhaa raajaave / ninakku sthuthi. Baarekmoor.

Janam : Ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappetename. / Ninte raajyam vareename. / Ninte thiruvishtam swarggathepole bhoomiyilum aakenam. / njangalkkaavashyamulla appam innu njangalkku tharename. / njangalude kadakkarodu njangal kshamichathupole / njangalude kadangalum paapangalum njangalodu kshamikkaname. / Pareekshayilekku njangale pravesippikkaruthe. / pinnayo dushtanil ninnum njangale rakshichukollename. / Enthukondennal raajyavum shakthiyum mahathvavum / ennekkeyum ninakkullaakunnu Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Kripa niranja Mariyame ninakku samaadhaanam.

Janam : Nammude karththaav ninnodu koode. / Sthreekalil nee vaazhthappettavalaakunnu. / Ninte udaraphalamaaya / nammude karththaaveshu Mashihhaa vaazhthappettavanaakunnu. / Shuddhamulla kanyaka Marthamariyame / Thamburaante amme / paapikalaaya njangalkkuvendhi / ippozhum eppozhum / njangalude maranasamayaththum / daivamthamburaanod abekshichukollename. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran : Shubaholabo.... (Pithaavinum Puthranum Parishuddha Roohaykkum sthuthi.)
Janam : Balaheenarum paapikalumaaya njangalude mel / anugrahavum karunayum / randu lokangalilum / ennumennekkum choriayappetumaraakaname. Aammeen.

Pattakkaaran : Daivamaaya karththaave! Njangalude santhoshaththinte aarambhavum, aanandaththinte poorththikaranavum, ninnodukoodayum, nee mukhaanthiravum undaakuvaan thakkavanna akshayamaaya santhoshaththinu njangale yogyarakkaename. Njangalude dehikalum aathmakalum ninnaal aanandikkumaraakaname. Ninte karunayaal njangalude dukhangal maayikkappedukayum, ninte dayavaal njangalude sukruthangal vardhikkukayum, anugrahangal niranjukaviyukayum, njangalude manassaakshikal shreshtamaayitheerukayum cheyyename. Njangalude manavaalan poornanum manavaatti shreshthamaayi theerename. Ninteyum aadimuthal ninne preethippaduthiyittulla sarvavishudhanmaardeyum koottaththil akshayamaaya saubhaagyaavasthayil njangal aanandikkumaraakaname. Pithru Puthra Parishuddhaathmaavaam Daivamae! Ninte vishudhanmaarude koottaththilum ninte valsalanmaarude ganaththilum chernnu ninnukond njangal ninakku sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaraakename. Hosho...

Dhanyan vinman vaasikale - Santo - shippichon
Bhaktarkkaruluka karunaabhdhe - Mshihaa - santhosham

Rakshakane vaidikar thirunaa - ma - ththil nalkiidum
Mothirabhooshakale sadayam - vaazhththuka - thrikkayyaal

Mothiramaruli thirusabhaye - Mashihhaa - vettappol
Paripaavana thanurudhirangal - kaikondaalavalum

Mothiramathinaal kolayeennum thaa maar rakshithayaayi
Athupole paapavimochanamee njangal nedatte

Maanavar vaanavar vandichu - vaazhththippaadunna
Thrithvarahasyam sampoojyam - Thaathaathmaja Roohhaa

Pattakkaaran : Pithru Puthra Parishuddhaathmaavaam Daivamae! Aakaashaththeyyum bhoomiyeyum uyaraththeyyum aazhattheyyum samyojippichathayaaya ninte samaadhaanam, ippol parasparam sameepichirikkunna ee njangalude sahodharanmare samyojippikkukayum thanmoolam aayushkkaalam muzhuvan parasparam snehikkukayum santhoshapoorththvam anyonyam sveekarikkukayum cheyyaththakkavannamulla aikyamathyam ivaril undaavukayum cheyyename. Hosho...

Nalkuka nanmozhi maanasamae - Halleluyaa
Sevikum njanarachane ennuracheyyum
Varshichaan kripa ninnadharaththil - Halleluyaa
Ennennekkum ninne Daivam vaazhththi

Upamakalaal - Shlemoon chonnaanevam, chaarumukhee - paaram nee
Shlaaghikkum nin priyaneyvan
En naadhan - pathinaayiramatiluththamanam
Than poonkaavaanisaraayael
Shubhran Yaakkobin lathayil
Rakthan narddeen thailaththil
Mridulan Labanon kaarakilil
Paarkkilivan Daivasaman
Vishruthanaa mivane naam vaazhththeedunnu.
Pattakkaaran : Naam ellaavarum praarththichu karththaavinodu anugrahangalum karunayum yaachikkanam.
Janam : Anugrahikkunnavanaaya karththaavae / njangalodu karuna cheythu / njangale sahaayikkename.
Pattakkaaran : Manushyarde sarvaparijnaanaththil... ninnaeyum ninte pithaavineyum Parishuddha Roohayeyum sthuthikkukayum cheyyumaarakaename. Hosho...

Pathivruthayaam - Paripaavana sabhaye
Vaanon kaanthan - vettoru neram
Sheemon Yo - hannaanennivare
Aahvaanam che - ythelpichevam
Veetin bharanam Sheemo - ne
Suvishe - sham Yohannaa - ne
Kalppichaan vilaye - reedum
Ra - kthathaal njan vaangiyoree
Sabhaye - ningal - samrakshi - ppin

Vishvastha sabhaye bhayamenthinnullil
Klesham - lesham venda
Aparane nee - mohikkaathathinaal
Ninne njanum - kaivedikill.
Lokaththinnavasaanaththil
Paarum - vaanumazhinjaalum
Vaazhum - neeyapaththene
Thaa - thaathmaja - vimaalaathmaavin
Geham - paarththaal nin throne - saam

Pattakkaaran : Vrathanishthayum vedippumulla aathmaakaale thanikkaayi vivaahanishchayam cheyyunna saakshaal sathyamanavaalanaayullovae! Thirumumpaake nilkkunna balaheenaraaya njangale maadhyastham moolam parasparam vivaahanishchayam cheyyappettukayum thammil manavaalathvaththinte madhyasthanaayi ninne angikarikkukayum cheythirikkunna ee daasaril ninn sukruthanadapadikalaya madhuraparimalam veeshukaan nee ivare yogyarakkaename.  Aathmaarththamaaya snehavum yojippum shaanthathayum vikaarabharithamallaatha aikyavum ivaril undaakumaarakaename. Aathmaavillum shareeraththilum parasparam nirmalatha samrakshikkukaan ivarkku shakthi nalkename. Ivar ninakkum ninte pithaavinum Parishuddha Roohaykkum sthuthiyum sthothravum kareettumaaraakename. Hosho...
Pattakkaaran : (Mothirangal kaiyiledukkunnu) Than karunayaalum bahulaaya krupayaalum ee mothirangale aasheervadhikkunna Pithaavinum Puthranum Parishuddha Roohaykkum sthuthi.

Pattakkaaran : (Mothirangale mel kai aavashippichukondu) Vishuddha Sabhasanthaanaṅṅaḷude santhoshapoorththikkaayi Pithaavinteyum Puthranteyum jeevanulla Parishuddha Roohayudeyum naamaththil ee mothirangal aasheervadhikkappettirikkunnu.

Pattakkaaran : (Manavaalan mothiram nalkikkondu)\n\tNammude Karththaavaaya Yeshu Mishihaayude valaththukai karunayode ninkalekk neeṭṭappetukayum, ninte vivaahanishchayaththinuḷḷa ee mothirathodukoode avideyutthe krupayum anugrahangalum ninakku labhikkukayum cheyyumaaraakattte. Krupaniranjjathum anugrahapradavumaaya ee valankai aayushkkaalam muzhuvan ninnodukoode undaayirikkunnu ninne kaaththukollukayum cheyyumaaraakattte.

Pattakkaaran : (Manavaattikku mothiram nalkikkondu)\n\tNammude Karththaavaaya Yeshu Mishihaayude anugraha poornnamaaya valaththukai adrushyamaayiNinkalekku neettappetukayum V. Shleehanmmaaril ninnennapole aachaaryanmmaarude kaikale ninnum ninte vivaahanishchayathinulla ee mothiram nee praapikkukayum cheyyumaaraakattte. Aathmashareerangalde swasthathayodum hrudaya santhoshaththodum koode Pithaavinum Puthranum Parishuddha Roohaykkum nee sthuthi kareettukayum cheyyumaaraakattte. Hosho...

Pattakkaaran : Vishuddha Sabhayaude santhoshathe thante abhisikthanmoolam poorththeeyakkunna Daivamaaya Karththaavu parasparam vivaahanishchayam kazhinjirikkunna ee nammuthe makkaley sathyaththilum neethiyilum sampoornnarakkukayum, ivar dharichirikkunna ee mothirangalodukoode swarggeeyamaaya anugrahangal ivarkku nalkukayum, paripaakathayaal ivare alankarikukayum vinayathaal ivare shreshttharakkukayum cheyyattte. Isahaakkinteyum Ribekkayudeyum vivaahanishchayathe swarnnaabharanangalal poorththeeyakkiyathupole ivareyum neethiyaakunna mothirangal kondu poornnarakkaattte.  Manavaalaney thante rakshayaal aanandippikkukayum manavaattiyey shaashvathavum akshayavumaaya manohara bhooshanangalal alankarikukayum cheyyumaaraakattte. Swarnnaabharanangal konduḷḷa alankaarangalkkaal mahimayeriya vedippin mudra kondu ivar alankarikappettumaarakattte. Ivarude ee anyonya bandhavum cherchayum thante preethikkum yogyamaaya vidhamulla swabhaava valarchaykkum uthakuvaan Daivamaaya Karththaavu sangathiyakkattte. Sakala kapata snehaththeyum ivarilninnum neekikkalayukayum, anyonyam snehikkaanayi snehagni kondu ivarude hrudayangale ujjvalippikkukayum cheyyattte. Akshayamaaya soundaryam kondu ivare alankarikumaaraakattte. Surabhilamaaya shooshanapushpangalekkaal sourabhyameriya paripaakathayaal ivarude manassaakshiyey nayikkukaanaayi sangathiyakkattte. Manushyavarggatte vidveshikkunna asooyaalukalaaya dushhtamanushyarde kaikale ninnum Daivam ivare samrakshikkukayum cheyyattte. Paavanamaaya vivaahathinte nirmala maarggatte vashalakkaunna dushhtaathmakaḷil ninnum ivare kaaththukollukayum cheyyattte. Karththaavu thante sannidhiyil ninn nalla kaalangaleum anugrahasampoornnamaaya samvathsarangalum ivarkku nalkumaaraakattte.

Daivamaaya Karththaave! Ninte mahimayude mumpaake nilkkunna balaheenarum paapikalumaaya njangale praarththanakal nee kelkkename. Ivarkk anugreehitha santhaanangaleyum saubhaagyakaalangaleyum nalkkename. Salpravarththikalayaaya sampaadyam ivarkku vardhippikkename. Ninilulla sathyavishwasaththil ivare sthirappettikkollename. Athil thanne sada sthithi cheyyuvaanum ivarude makkalkkum athine avakaashaamaayi nalkkivaanum krupa cheyyename. Ee virunninaayi orungi vannirikkunnaavarkku ninte karunakaleyum anugrahangaleyum samruddhiyaayi nalkkename. Ninte vijaya sleebaayaal ee manavaalaneyum manavaattiyeyum kaaththukollukayum, Pithaavum Puthranum Parishuddha Roohayumaayaullovae, njangellavarkkumelum ninte karunakal varshikkukayum cheyyename. Hosho...

Sabhayaam Thirusabhayaa - Mee - njyaan
Athyunnathanude Manavaa - tti

Paavanasabha chonnee tunnu
Envaranevan njyaan dha - nya

Vandikkunnen va - nne - nne
Vettoru manavaalan thanne

Priyanenne vettoru naalil
Sathvaramunnathi njyaan poondu
Srushtikalathilathisha - yamanduu
Mahimayaninnyol njyaan dha - nya

Enne maamodeesaayaal
Aathmeeyaayudhamaniyichaan
Viralinmel mey ra - kthangal
Mothiramayen perkke - ki

Skeepaayaal njyaan ve - ttol - aam
Sumukhee swagathamothu - nnen
Thathaniketham njyaan pooki
Vitteedaam njyaan Roohaye

Pattakkaran: Daivaththaal neethikereekappetta ee saakshyathinayi orungivannirikkunna vishwasikale! Ningalude buddhimuttin muppathum arupathum noorum irattiyayi avidunnu prathiphalam nalkumarakatte. Eppozhum ningalkku nanmakal nalkumarakatte. Namude karthavinte Sleeba + raavum pakalum ningalodukoode sthithi cheythu dushtanil ninnum avante sainyangalil ninnum ningale kaathukollukayum cheyyumarakatte.
